items.content_html: typing-speed-tester: A lightweight, customizable typing speed tester to measure WPM and accuracy, built with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Practice and improve your typing skills!

items.content_html: This is a lightweight, extensible, and user-friendly content editor built with pure JavaScript. It supports rich text editing, inline code, code blocks with syntax styling, tooltips, and a fully integrated emoji picker.

items.content_html: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.
items.title: letmaker/liko: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript.  Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI.  Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
